subject: Any news about my package?
description_text:
It has been one week since your last message and I still have no update.
  30 days have passed since purchase and the shipment has no clear status
about my package.
 Please confirm whether DHL has been officially contacted and provide a
reference number, or proceed with a refund/replacement.
*If I do not receive an update within 3 business days, I will proceed with
a formal complaint.*

conversations.body_text: Hi Cristy Ichim,     We apologize for the delay. This is the status of your DHL order tracking.  Additionally, two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been delayed due to heavy snowfall in Europe. Road conditions are currently blocked by snow accumulation, and we expect these shipments to arrive at the warehouse within the next couple of days. We will expedite delivery and will resend your order once the goods arrive.
